summary:
*Black Panther* is a 2018 superhero movie about a king named T'Challa, who also goes by the name Black Panther. When his father dies, T'Challa becomes king of a secret, advanced African nation called Wakanda. A rival, Killmonger, wants to rule Wakanda and start a global revolution.

The film stars Chadwick Boseman as T'Challa and Michael B. Jordan as Killmonger. It was the first Marvel Studios movie with a Black director (Ryan Coogler) and mostly Black actors. It received great reviews and made a lot of money worldwide, breaking box office records.
title: Black Panther (film)
